Sequence Information.Source: AI predicted,  Derived from UniProt ID: Q9H4K7, human protein

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (43.75%) toChem-KVLV=R=K: 20%, L=Y: 13%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 3.1 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 3.1 uM), A. baumannii (MIC 0.8 uM), S. enterica (MIC 13 uM), S. aureus (MIC 50 uM), E. faecium (MIC 3.1 uM), and M. luteus (MIC 3.1 uM).In vitro toxicity:  horse RBC: 90% hemolysis at 150 uM. HepG2 cell (IC50 116 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 10 mM SDS, a different conformation at 1 and 5 mM.
Literature Information.Author: Ramos-Llorens M, Bello-Madruga R, Valle J, Andreu D, Torrent M. 2024
Literature Information.Title: PyAMPA: a high-throughput prediction and optimization tool for antimicrobial peptides.
